author: DarkPhaerie
title: Cute
review:
Box/Instructions

The instructions were easy to follow (of course) and included instructions on doing numbers 0-9.

Parts

Parts are fun and has extra for being able to change the numbers out with each passing birthday or whatever number you want to put on there.

Minifigures

The minifigure is a jester which is only the torso. But he has two faces, one happy and one crying which is great fun for me as after a certain age we tend to hate birthdays!

The build

The build was fun. Took about an hour (but it takes me longer as I sort out all the pieces). It was interesting to see how they used certain parts to make it come together.

The completed model

The completed model is FUN! The Jester "pops" out of the cake with a push of the button so there are two ways to display this..(three if you change out the way the facial expression is).

Overall opinion

I enjoyed this set. I really feel like it was worth the price I paid and is something to be enjoyed changing out over the years. Great for displaying on the table for birthdays, and on the bookcase/wherever you normally display , for many years.
